languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s power is temporarily rerouted to its {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Speed{/g} reduced by −3. {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}Firing range{/g} reduced by −2.
languages.original_text:
Энергия временно перенаправлена на {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щиты{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Скорость{/g} снижена на −3, а {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}дальнобойность{/g} — на −2.

languages.text:

La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} est réduite de −3. La {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}portée de tir{/g} est réduite de −2.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的能量暂时被重新分配至{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}处。
{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}降低3点，武器{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程{/g}降低2点。

languages.text:
Redirige temporalmente la energía de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} a los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g}.
Reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} en −3. Reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}alcance de disparo{/g} en −2.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の動力は一時的に{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}に回されている。
{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}が−3減少する。{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程{/g}が−2減少する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} gücü geçici olarak {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkanlara{/g} yönlendirilir.
{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Hız{/g} 3 puan azalır. {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}Atış menzili{/g} 2 puan azalır.
